title: The Dark
description: Introducing the darkest novel never written, by I. C. Nothing and authored with No Light At All.Be thrilled and amazed as you turn each page and start sinking further into the darkness. Not until you get to the end will you finally see the light!Look What Nobody Had To Say!"The darkest novel I've never read!"-R. U. Keeding"I found myself lost in this book."- Etis Blank"I felt lost and in the dark until the end!"-Ann Black 240 pure Black and Blank pages fill up this hilariously surreal novelty book.A great addition to your coffee table at home, or something to break up the monotony at the office! Lay it on a table top, or insert it in your bookshelf, then an unsuspecting victim will be lured to the fascinating aspect of The Dark, and afterwards they will find themselves immersed in nothing but blackness! Nothing but 240 pure black pages. It will make friends and family laugh out loud, and would make a perfect gag gift! Get your copy today!*This book is a novelty item and is not to be taken seriously. It is filled with black colored blank pages and only intended as a gag gift or conversation piece.*
author: I.C. Nothing
